Peter Cartwright (30 Ọgọstụ 1935 - 18 Nọvemba 2013) bụ onye South Africa a mụrụ na Britain na-eme ihe nkiri nke mere ọtụtụ narị ihe nkiri na telivishọn, ihe nkiri na redio ma rụọ ọrụ nke ukwuu na ihe nkiri, ma na mpaghara na West End nke London.
A mụrụ Cartwright na Krugersdorp, Gauteng, South Africa, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na St
Ọ bịarutere Britain na 1959 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na RADA.
A maara ya nke ọma na South Africa maka usoro mgbasa ozi telivishọn nke ọ bụ ihu Charles Glass, onye guzobere South African Breweries na onye na-emepụta mmanya nke na-emepụta Castle Lager
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ụlọ ya na London na 18 Nọvemba 2013, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na asatọ
Softly, Softly: Taskforce, Z-Cars, Rumpole of the Bailey, Danger UXB, Yes Prime Minister, Casualty, Shackleton, Longitude, The Vicar of Dibley, Doctor Who
Ọ pụtara n'ihe ngosi Britain Emmerdale na-eme dika George Postlethwaite bishọp akụkọ ifo nke Skipdale.
Na Harry Potter na Order of the Phoenix, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye dibịa afa, Elphias Doge, akụkụ nke Order of the phoenix, na-eduga Harry na Grimmauld Place.
Ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Wimbledon, Cry Freedom, Gandhi na The Fourth Protocol.
Sleuth (Fortune Theatre, West End), Habeas Corpus (Theatre Royal, Windsor), Don Carlos (Royal Exchange, Manchester),
